com.inrix.sdk

Class IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsInRadius

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsInRadius
  • Enclosing class:
    IncidentsManager

    public static final class IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsInRadius
extends Object
    XDIncidentOptionsInRadius in a particular search radius defined by [center,searchRadius].

      Fields

      static int INCIDENT_TYPE_ACCIDENTS
      Return reports about accidents.

      Return all incidents.
      static int INCIDENT_TYPE_CONGESTION
      Return reports about the slowing down of traffic on your route.
      static int INCIDENT_TYPE_CONSTRUCTION
      Return only construction incidents.
      static int INCIDENT_TYPE_EVENT
      Return unusual events slated for the area such as a major sporting event.

      Return reports about hazards.
      static int INCIDENT_TYPE_LANE_CLOSURE
      Return reports about lane closures.

      Return reports about the police presence.

      Return reports about road closures.
      static int INCIDENT_TYPE_WEATHER
      Return weather events that could alter traffic speed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XDIncidentOptionsInRadius

        public XDIncidentOptionsInRadius(GeoPoint center,
                         double radius)
        Initializes a new instance of the IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsInRadius class.

        Parameters:
        center - The center of the circular region from which to get the incidents.
        radius - The radius of the circular region. Units of radius are determined at runtime through UserPreferences.getSettingUnits().

    • Method Detail

      • setCenter

        public IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsInRadius setCenter(GeoPoint center)
        Sets the center of the circular bounding area from which to get data. Any features that are fully or partially enclosed within the bounding area are selected.
        Parameters:
        center - The center of the region.
        Returns:
        This instance of the IncidentsManager.IncidentRadiusOptions class.
        Throws:
        IncidentsManager.IncidentsManagerException - when center is invalid.

      • setRadius

        public IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsInRadius setRadius(double radius)
        Sets the radius of the circular bounding area from which to return data. Any features that are fully or partially enclosed within the bounding area are selected.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the bounding area, which must be a positive integer. Units of radius are determined at runtime through UserPreferences.getSettingUnits().
        Returns:
        This instance of the IncidentsManager.IncidentRadiusOptions class.
        Throws:
        IncidentsManager.IncidentsManagerException - when radius is invalid.

      • getCenter

        public GeoPoint getCenter()
        Gets the center of region.
        Returns:
        Region center.

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()
        Get radius of the bounding area.
        Returns:
        Radius in miles/kilometers (depending on Units parameter).

      • setIncidentOutputFields

        public final T setIncidentOutputFields(com.inrix.sdk.IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsBase.IncidentOutputField... outputFields)
        Sets the list of IncidentOutputFields. If not set, default contains all IncidentOutputField enums with the exception of IncidentOutputField.AREA and IncidentOutputField.RDS.
        Parameters:
        outputFields - the list of IncidentOutputFields.
        Returns:
        The current instance.

      • setIncidentTypes

        public final T setIncidentTypes(int types)
        Sets the incident types for the current IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsBase.
        Parameters:
        types - Incident types. Can be INCIDENT_TYPE_ALL or any combination of the following:
        • INCIDENT_TYPE_CONSTRUCTION
        • INCIDENT_TYPE_EVENT
        • INCIDENT_TYPE_CONGESTION
        • INCIDENT_TYPE_ACCIDENTS
        • INCIDENT_TYPE_WEATHER
        • INCIDENT_TYPE_POLICE
        • INCIDENT_TYPE_HAZARD
        • INCIDENT_TYPE_ROAD_CLOSURE
        • INCIDENT_TYPE_LANE_CLOSURE
        Returns:
        Current instance.
